mapper.insert: insert into tbl_fin_subject(id, code, name, fullName, category, parentId, initBalance, modifydate, remark, status) values(#{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{category}, #{parent.id}, #{initBalance}, sysdate(), #{remark}, #{status})
